title: Companion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to accompany one player during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you choose to accompany a player, all actions performed against you and your target will fail. Your target will also be forced to use their night action on you bypassing redirection immunity. You are immune to any roleblock or redirect abilities used by your target.
- You may not use your ability for two consecutive nights.
- You may not accompany yourself.

desc:
Post 213
*Never gonna run around and desert you.*
